steps.title: Welcome to Touch-N-Stars
steps.content: This app helps you control your astronomy equipment and plan your observations.

steps.title: Navigation
steps.content: Use the navigation bar to switch between different sections of the app. On mobile, swipe left/right to navigate.

steps.title: Equipment Control
steps.content: Connect and control your telescope, camera, and other devices from the Equipment section.

steps.title: Squence Control & Monitor
steps.content: Control and monitor your sequence. You need to have an advanced sequence loaded in N.I.N.A

steps.title: Settings
steps.content: Configure app settings and preferences here. You can always restart this tutorial from the settings page.
